The facilities/va_opt.hpp header defines a variadic macro for the C++20 level that offers a more flexible alternative to the __VA_OPT__ construct.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/facilities/va_opt.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_VA_OPT (v)
